glusr_usr_company_desc:
We,YadhuKiran Technologies, began our operations in the year 2010, as a manufacturer, supplier, exporter and and service providers of a commendable range of Steel Structures & Metal Products. The highly praised and preferred range is made up of quality products like Steel Structures, Steel Open Sections and Tapered Steel Sections. These products offered by us, are known to be sturdy, durable and highly resistant to corrosion. For quality standardization, the offered product is manufactured in accordance with the set industry norms and guidelines. In addition to these, we provide some of the finest We are providing services of Installation and AMC services.

Our highly developed infrastructural facility has been laced with state-of-the-art machinery and equipment, for attainment of a number of organizational goals and objectives. For the purpose of achieving smoother and better operations, we have parted our facility into a number of highly operational units that are led by highly skilled employees. These units work in compliance with each other, to attain high level of productivity. We keep upgrading the firm on a regular basis for the purpose of living up to our market standing. 

Under the expert guidance of our CEO Mr. Harish Kumar V, we have managed to reach heights of success. His managerial skills, reasoning abilities and passion for work, have always been assets for us. Further, he takes commendable care of the employees’ satisfaction, by providing them timely increments, incentives and promotions to the deserving candidates. We have been able cater a huge clientele across the global market.
glusr_usr_sellinterest: Manufacturer of pre engineered buildings and industrial structures and prefabricated structures.
